tags.description: The MapComplete theme Cyclestreets has a layer Cyclestreets showing features with this tag

The layer 'Cyclestreets allows to upload images and adds them under the 'image'-tag (and image:0, image:1, ... for multiple images). Furhtermore, this layer shows images based on the keys image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
